name: DGCP MaMeeFarm — Proof 444
description:
This proof records the environmental condition at MaMeeFarm before the start of daily work.

The image documents a temperature and humidity check conducted in the early morning.
The measurement device displays 14.7°C temperature and 70% relative humidity, captured at 05:59 AM (local time) on January 6, 2026.

This record serves as verifiable real-world environmental data, collected prior to labor activities, under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.
